text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Krapinske Toplice is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there are 5,367 inhabitants in the area, absolute majority of which are Croats. The settlements in the municipality are: * Čret, population 571 * Donje Vino, population 123 * Gregurovec, population 131 * Hršak Breg, population 150 * Jasenovac Zagorski, population 72 * Jurjevec, population 154 * Klokovec, population 755 * Klupci, population 119 * Krapinske Toplice, population 1,295 * Lovreća Sela, population 209 * Mala Erpenja, population 606 * Maturovec, population 84 * Oratje, population 170 * Selno, population 395 * Slivonja Jarek, population 96 * Viča Sela, population 189 * Vrtnjakovec, population 248 ==References== ==External links== * Krapinske Toplice tourist portal Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Spa towns in Croatia Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Krapinske Toplice
